tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE smart_contracts (
    contract_id UUID,
    contract_name VARCHAR(100),
    creator_address VARCHAR(50),
    creation_date DATE,
    bytecode BYTEA,
    is_active BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE contract_transactions (
    transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    contract_address VARCHAR(255),
    sender_address VARCHAR(255),
    receiver_address VARCHAR(255),
    amount DECIMAL(18,2),
    transaction_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE contract_events (
    event_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    contract_address VARCHAR(255),
    event_name VARCHAR(50),
    event_description TEXT,
    event_date TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE smart_contracts (
    contract_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    contract_name VARCHAR(255),
    contract_address VARCHAR(255),
    deploy_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE contract_owners (
    owner_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    owner_name VARCHAR(255),
    contract_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (contract_id) REFERENCES smart_contracts(contract_id)
)

CREATE TABLE contract_events (
    event_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    event_name VARCHAR(255),
    event_description TEXT,
    contract_id INT,
    event_date TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (contract_id) REFERENCES smart_contracts(contract_id)
)

CREATE TABLE contract_transactions (
    transaction_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    contract_id INT,
    amount DECIMAL(10, 2),
    transaction_date TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (contract_id) REFERENCES smart_contracts(contract_id)
)

CREATE TABLE contracts (
    contract_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    contract_name VARCHAR(255),
    creator_address VARCHAR(255),
    creation_date TIMESTAMP,
    last_update TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE contract_events (
    event_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    contract_id UUID,
    event_type VARCHAR(100),
    event_description TEXT,
    event_timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE contract_transitions (
    transition_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    contract_id UUID,
    transition_name VARCHAR(100),
    from_state VARCHAR(50),
    to_state VARCHAR(50),
    transition_timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE contract_functions (
    function_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    contract_id UUID,
    function_name VARCHAR(100),
    function_description TEXT,
    function_code TEXT
);
